name: Hidden Truths
description:
A Horror escape room creating for a Level Design assignment in the Independent Video Game Design program at Dawson College (https://www.dawsoncollege.qc.ca/aec/programs/independent-video-game-design/) If you are in Montreal, check it out! 

Team:

  • Gabriel Bulcao Rachman : Code + Puzzles
  • Jeremie Therrien-Noel : Code + UI
  • Jeremy Selwyn : Code, Audio 
  • Maria Starostina: 2D Artist + UI
  • Min-Ting Tu: 3D Artist + Level
  • Myranda Gauvin: Tech Artist + Lighting

Controls:

  • W A D S : Character movements (Walk).
  • Shift: Character movements (Run)
  • Mouse: Character movements (Look around).
  • E : Take Objects.
  • Left Mouse Button: Interact with objects.
  • Right Mouse Button: Look through the magnifying glass. 

Audio:

  • Theme: Alexander Starostin
  • Rest of SFX all no attribution required (and royalty free) from: https://gamesounds.xyz/ and https://www.zapsplat.com/

Thank you!
